awards.description: THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST SUN'AQ TRIBE OF KODIAK IN BUILDING CAPACITY AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  TASKS INCLUDE MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND PROGRAMS; RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES AND ATTENDING TRAINING; COLLABORATING WITH OTHER AGENCIES AND CONDUCTING OUTREACH; UPDATING THE ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY AND PLAN; DEVELOPING A GIS PROGRAM; AND ASSESSING BASELINE SURFACE WATER QUALITY.   NOTE: THE INDIRECT COST RATE AGREEMENT ON FILE WITH EPA EXPIRESD 09/30/2016, YOU MAY NOT DRAW DOWN FUNDS FOR INDIRECT COSTS WITHOUT A CURRENT, APPROVED RATE IN PLACE.

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE SUN'AQ TRIBE OF KODIAK IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3. BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; AND 4. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES AND CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF OCEAN WATER QUALITY, SURFACE WATER QUALITY AND CONTAMINANTS; UPDATING THE ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; AND COLLECTING BASELINE OCEAN AND SURFACE WATER QUALITY DATA.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE SUN'AQ TRIBE OF KODIAK, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.   ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; FINANCIAL REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; AND AN UPDATED ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY REPORT.
SUN'AQ TRIBE OF KODIAK TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM AGREEMENT (STRA-21)

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
